title: Introduction - Prusti user guide
content:
# [Introduction][1]

This is the user guide for [Prusti][2] - a Rust verifier built upon the the
[Viper verification infrastructure][3].

[1]: #introduction
[2]: https://github.com/viperproject/prusti-dev/
[3]: https://www.pm.inf.ethz.ch/research/viper.html
